name: Mouse Corp. (itch)
description:
Explore a field of caves and ruins under the benign aspect of the Mouse Corp. A mysterious 3d adventure awaits your survey. It's Mouse Corp. - what are friends for?

Produced in two months seperated by one year. Pay what thou wilt is the whole of the law so feel free to try before you buy. Payment is optional but helps fund further games... More than the world has ever seen....

Music by NEW VADERS. Game by Stephen Gillmurphy. This started out from a desire to just make something pretty and is best interpreted from this angle. Thank you for looking at our video game.
